# Weather Dashboard - Next.js Project

This is a Next.js application created with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint.

## Project Information

- **Framework**: Next.js 16.1.6 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Linting**: ESLint
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Development

The project is configured with a dev task that runs the Next.js development server.

To start the development server:
- Run the "dev" task from VS Code
- Or use: `npm run dev`

The app will be available at http://localhost:3000

## Project Structure

- `/src/app` - App Router pages and components
- `/public` - Static assets
- `/src/app/page.tsx` - Home page (Hello World)
